snippet: The Giants' injury news got worse when defensive tackle Shaun Rogers was diagnosed with a blood clot, and some players think the beds at training camp have contributed to the team's injury problems.
abstract: The Giants' injury news got worse when defensive tackle Shaun Rogers was diagnosed with a blood clot, and some players think the beds at training camp have contributed to the team's injury problems.

headline.main: Mounting Injuries Trouble Giants; Are Beds to Blame?
